sentences.en: A horseshoe has always been considered a good luck char.
sentences.cn: 马蹄铁一直被视作一种吉祥物.

sentences.en: Anthracite char has poor pore structure and small specific surface area.
sentences.cn: 无烟煤焦分支孔贫乏,比表面积很小.

sentences.en: CHAR is a global variable which will always hold the source program being scanned.
sentences.cn: CHAR是全程变量,它总存放当前所扫描的源程序的字符.

sentences.en: Character and the value of the constant expression is representable in the type char.
sentences.cn: 在char类型中,Character和常量表达式的值是可表示的.

sentences.en: Halve the peppers and char the skins under a hot grill.
sentences.cn: 将甜椒剖成两半，在滚热的烤架上烤至外壳微焦。

sentences.en: In char, byte , and short you can see the effect of promotion with the arithmetic operators.
sentences.cn: 在char, byte 和short中,我们可看到算术运算符的“转型”效果.

sentences.en: It had clean whitewashed walls, a table and a char.
sentences.cn: 屋里有白白的墙, 还有条长桌,一把椅子.

sentences.en: Local char set is bad. If provided, must be 24 characters.
sentences.cn: 本地字符集不正确. 若要提供字符集, 则须为24个字符.

sentences.en: Normal Fried Rice Ingredients: Bean Sprout, Char Siew, Crabstick & Sausage.
sentences.cn: 普通炒饭配料: 豆芽 、 叉烧 、 蟹肉 、 香肠.

sentences.en: Notice in the above code the maximum possible hexadecimal values for char, byte, and short.
sentences.cn: 注意在上述代码中,最大的十六进制值只会在char, byte以及short身上出现.

sentences.en: Roast the peppers until the skin begins to char and blister.
sentences.cn: 把这些辣椒烤到表皮发黑起泡为止。

sentences.en: The fragmentation char combustion behavior in a fluidized bed combustor.
sentences.cn: 利用下行气流振动床代替流化床,研究了煤的碎裂特性.

sentences.en: The results showed that PEPA was an excellent char - forming agents.
sentences.cn: 结果表明:PEPA是 良好的成炭剂,与基体有很好的相容性,与MC协同 作用于PBT树脂 具有出色的阻燃效果(达到UL94V-0级).

sentences.en: Toast hazelnuts on a baking sheet until the skins char.
sentences.cn: 在烘板上将榛子烤至表皮微煳。

words.tran_cn: 烧焦（char的过去分词）；把…烧成碳

trans.tran_cn: 碳，（尤指家庭的）杂务，<鱼>嘉鱼，茶（英式英语旧时用法）

trans.tran_en: to burn something so that its outside becomes black

trans.tran_cn: 烧成炭，烧焦，<主英>做杂役女佣
